beginning.dialogue:
You are an antique hunter, and a good one at that. You've fallen on hard times, 
you haven't had any big finds in a while. You get a tip of a house that is incredibly old, 
and has a high chance of having antiques.It is located in a clearing in the middle of an ancient forest. 
But apparently it is the lair of a terrible beast, one that scares away all who try to loot the place. 
With nothing to lose, and not believing in folktales, you decide to explore this old house. 
You make your way deep into the forest...

level1.dialogue:
You finally make it to the front door of the decrepit house. All the house's wooden walls are gray with age,
 and it looks like the roof will collapse at any moment. But you gather your nerves and turn the door handle.
 As you step in to take a look around, the smell of mold and mildew attacks your nose.
 "This definitely can't be good for my health", you think to yourself.
level1.action1: 1) Look around for a light switch.
level1.event1:
You look around for a light switch but you realize the house in the middle of nowhere, 
and probably too old to have electricity.
level1.action2: 2) Look for a lantern or torch you can light.
level1.event2: You scan around for a lantern but find nothing except cobwebs and old pieces of wood, probably from the house itself.

level2.dialogue:
After scanning the main room for a while, a pleasent smell suddenly wafts towards your face.
 You turn your head to an old table, and are surprised to find a delicious-looking spread of food on it.
 On a bookshelf, there sits an old book.
level2.action1: 1) You sit down on the wooden chair at the table and eat a meal.
level2.event1: The food tastes as good as it smells, and now you're completely stuffed.
level2.event2: The book is an old novel, and you think it may be worth something, so you decide to keep it. Out of curiousity, you start to read the first few pages.

level3.dialogue: You walk into another room and see a globe of the world on an old dresser, with a broken mirror hanging on the wall
level3.action1: 1) You walk up to the dresser to get a closer look at the globe.
level3.event1: It is indeed a globe of the Earth, you decide to take the globe
level3.action2: 2) You walk up to the old, broken mirror to see if you can catch your reflection.
level3.event2: You see a blurry, foggy reflection of yourself. The mirror appears to have once been an elegant looking glass. You decide to take it.

level4.dialogue: You start to feel tired. You can either rest a bit or search the dresser for something.
level4.action1: 1) You decide to take a rest on the floor.
level4.action2: 2) You push forward and search the dresser.
level4.event2: You decide to check the dresser and find a gold pocket watch inside. Itâ€™s old and no longer works, but it could likely fetch a decent price.
